sql.content: create table tb_communication ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, id varchar(100), source varchar(50), target varchar(50), directive varchar(50), content text, create_date timestamp )

create table tb_inspection ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, plan_id varchar(100), plan_name varchar(500), plan_type integer, dispatch_man varchar(50), deal_man varchar(500), job_man varchar(500), plan_date timestamp, start_date timestamp, end_date timestamp, last_modify_date timestamp, room_name varchar(500), lock_mac varchar(50), state integer, content text, note text, user_job_number varchar(20) )

create table tb_inspection_item ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, item_id varchar(100), item_name varchar(500), item_cate_name varchar(500), equipment_name varchar(500), cabinet_name varchar(500), cabinet_lock_mac varchar(50), item_flag integer, item_standard text, start_date timestamp, last_modify_date timestamp, inspection_id integer, state integer, result text, note text, is_default_input integer )
create table tb_lock_device ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, lock_mac varchar(50), lock_name varchar(500), user_job_number varchar(20), first_letter varchar(1) )
create table tb_temperature_humidity ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, temperature varchar(100), humidity varchar(100), room_name varchar(500), user_job_number varchar(20) )

create table tb_attachment_upload ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, create_date timestamp, path varchar(200), type varchar(100), uploadedId varchar(100), foreignId integer, source varchar(100), user_job_number varchar(20) )
